title: Ticket #220: schedd should put GSI DN (and VOMS FQAN if present) into job ad
description: igor pointed out that if GSI is used for submitting a job, the schedd should insert the DN and FQAN into the job even if the x509userproxy attribute is not defined.
remarks:

i suppose this should apply across all authentication methods, and the raw AuthenticatedName should be placed in the job ad (not just the mapped user).
